item.title: 01-solution
item.description: Note that due dates can be found in the Syllabus; submission instructions can be found on the Assignment Instructions page. In this assignment, you can submit a Google Doc (or other text editor, pictures, etc.) but also your \({\tt R}\) code via Google Drive. Samira will go over the submission process in the lab. \({\bf 60}\) total marks. Question 1 [7 points] You obtained a \({\tt gmail}\) account for this course.
